title: YouTube View Bot (Referer & Proxy Focused)
description: Watches YouTube videos using specified referers and Apify residential proxies. Optimized for US, UK, HU.

videoUrls.title: Video URLs
videoUrls.description: REQUIRED: List of YouTube video URLs to view. Must have a corresponding referer URL in the 'Referer URLs' list if custom referers are used.

refererUrls.title: Referer URLs (Optional)
refererUrls.description: OPTIONAL: List of referer URLs. Each URL corresponds to a video in 'Video URLs' by order. If an entry is empty or this list is shorter than 'Video URLs', those videos will be accessed directly (no custom referer).

watchTimePercentage.title: Watch Time Percentage
watchTimePercentage.description: Percentage of the video to watch (e.g., 70-95).

useProxies.title: Use Apify Proxies
useProxies.description: Whether to use Apify proxy service. Recommended.

proxyCountry.title: Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Select proxy country. US, UK, HU are optimized. 'ANY' for random residential.

proxyGroups.title: Proxy Groups (Advanced)
proxyGroups.description: Apify proxy groups to use. 'RESIDENTIAL' is recommended for this actor.

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (invisible). Recommended for Apify platform.

skipAdsAfterMinSeconds.title: Min Ad Watch Time (seconds)
skipAdsAfterMinSeconds.description: Minimum seconds to watch a skippable video ad before attempting to skip (if autoSkipAds is true).

skipAdsAfterMaxSeconds.title: Max Ad Watch Time (seconds)
skipAdsAfterMaxSeconds.description: Maximum seconds to watch a skippable video ad before attempting to skip (if autoSkipAds is true). A random value between min and max will be chosen.

timeout.title: Operation Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: General timeout for browser operations in seconds (e.g., page load).

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of videos to process concurrently.

concurrencyInterval.title: Interval Between Video Starts (seconds)
concurrencyInterval.description: Seconds to wait between starting the processing of each video (if concurrency > 1, this applies to staggering starts within the concurrency limit).
